remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項嘗試變更之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式，但模式實際變更之前。The event is raised when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 這可讓您提供的事件處理常式執行自訂的常式，例如設定控制特定的模式，或取消模式變更時就會發生此事件。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入委派給事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control.
